description: DevAccelerate.Core is a DevAccelerate library that provides all the basic interfaces for the most common cross-cutting concerns such as configuration, caching, logging, exception handling, etc.
releaseNotes:
v2.0.1
1) Made the library more lightweight.
2) Types related to files, mials, identity, and lists have been removed. They will be delivered as separate GitHub projects and Nuget packages.
3) General optimization and bug fixes.

v2.0.2
1) Added general-purpose validation interfaces.

v2.0.3
1) Minor improvements.
2) Changed target framework to .NET 4.7.1.

v3.0.2
1) Removed entity management classes and interfaces.
2) Removed the empty DaApplicationContextExteions class.
3) Optimized code.

v4.0.0 & v4.0.1
1) Major update with 4.0 project release.
2) Added mail provider interfaces and classes.
3) Added Sms provider interfaces and classes.
4) Optimized configuration classes.
5) Added back entity management interfaces and classes.
6) Shifted the project back to its dedicated GitHub repo.

v4.0.2
1) Updated documentation.
2) Removed unncessary configuration classes.
3) Renamed all the types with prefix "Da". This is a breaking change.
summary: DevAccelerate.Core is a DevAccelerate library that provides all the basic interfaces for the most common cross-cutting concerns.
title: DevAccelerate.Core
